headline: Hilton Increases Stock Repurchase Authorization
summary: MCLEAN, Va., January 14, 2026--Hilton Worldwide Holdings Inc. (NYSE: HLT) today announced that its Board of Directors authorized a $3.5 billion increase in the amount available for repurchases of common stock under Hiltonâ€™s existing stock repurchase program, bringing the total amount currently authorized for future repurchases to approximately $4.6 billion.

headline: Hilton Increases Stock Buyback Authorization by $3.5B
summary: Hilton Increases Stock Buyback Authorization by $3.5B
